name: SupportDocs
description: Generate help centers for your iOS apps, with Markdown! All you need to do is write your documents on GitHub, and install the library in your app. SupportDocs' custom GitHub Action and GitHub Pages will take care of the rest.

name: Grade Calculators
description: The grade calculators are simple tools to calculate what you need to get on a final in order to get a particular grade or to see what your grade will look like after you've taken the final.

name: Schedules
description: An app for all bell schedules. It tells you exactly how much time is remaining in a period, as well as the next period and its starting time.

name: QuickOCR
description: Drag-and-drop to find text. Powered by Apple's Vision framework.

name: Nebula New Tab
description: A clean and simple new tab page. Currently available in the Firefox and Microsoft Edge add-on stores.

name: Reactor
description: Automatically add reactions to users' messages

name: Squirrel
description: Enable scrolling in the Xcode Simulator! â€” created by Andrew Zheng

name: Playlist Duplicator
description: A simple way to duplicate the contents of one Spotify playlist into another.

name: Brainteasers (client)
description: A trivia game powered by Next.js, Socket.io, and The Trivia API

name: Brainteasers (server)
description: The server for Brainteasers, a trivia game powered by Socket.io and The Trivia API

name: Ramadan Taskminder
description: Ramadan Taskminder allows you to stay on top of your tasks for Ramadan. Keep track of your Qur'an reading and other key tasks.

name: 2fa.directory
description: A list of popular sites and whether or not they support two-factor authenticaton

name: HTTP Monitor Bot
description: A Cloudflare Worker designed to monitor an HTTP service, then update cState with the status

name: TestFlight Cleaner
description: Clean your TestFlight tester CSVs and avoid dealing with those pesky errors!
